property.name: countSQL
property.value: select count(0) from ( select * from TLV_LOG_BWList where datcreattime > date '{0}' and datcreattime < (date '{1}'+1) and numlisttype in ({2})) a

property.name: pageSQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from ( select numlogid,numuserid, to_char(datcreattime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') datcreattime, to_char(datmodifytime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') datmodifytime, Nvl(numtotalnum,0) as numtotalnum , Nvl(numsuccessnum,0) as numsuccessnum , Nvl(numfailed,0) as numfailed,vc2filename, numlisttype,numsrc,numsvcid,vc2backuppath,vc2svcname, vc2departname,vc2username,numstate,VC2NAME from TLV_LOG_BWList where NUMLOGID in ( select numlogid from TLV_LOG_BWList where datcreattime > date '{0}' and datcreattime < (date '{1}'+1) and numlisttype in ({2}) ) order by DATCREATTIME desc,NUMLOGID desc) adsfsds where rownum < {4}+1) where numrowasdf > {3}

property.name: theSQL
property.value: SELECT DISTINCT (RB.NUMSVCID) AS SVCID FROM TLV_ROUTESTRA_BASE RB WHERE RB.NUMPRODID = {0} AND RB.NUMOPID in(1,4)

property.name: queryBWListLogDetailSQL
property.value: select vc2mobile,vc2state from tlv_details_bwlist where numlogid={0} and datcreatetime > date '{1}' and datcreatetime < date '{1}' + 1
